**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 180 1.1 _[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Characters with the Oracle archetype can still take 10 minutes of refocusing to reduce their cursebound condition, even if they do not have a focus pool._ A mysterious force granted you divine magic and a curse. Multiclass Oracle Characters The oracle archetype is a great choice for characters who want to use powerful cursebound abilities that come at a cost. It's especially good for characters looking to add some high-risk, high-reward options.
  • Martial oracles can use powerful cursebound abilities to access unique magical effects.
  • Spellcaster oracles can further flex their diverse pool of options at the cost of a curse.
